^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

IBM.description: IBM Oem propperties for Power Supply Metrics.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

InputPowerHistoryItem.description: Contains power supply input power history.
InputPowerHistoryItem.longDescription: Contains power supply input power history, timestamped average and maximum input power over 30 second intervals.

InputPowerHistoryItem.description: Contains power supply input power history.
InputPowerHistoryItem.longDescription: Contains power supply input power history, timestamped average and maximum input power over 30 second intervals.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Date.description: Timestamp for when records were retrieved
Date.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of objects representing the timestamp for when a record was retrieved from the power supply.

Average.description: The average power supply input power values.
Average.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of objects that represent the average input power the power supply has calculated, each over a 30 second interval.

Maximum.description: The maximum power supply input power values
Maximum.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of object that represent the maximum input power the power supply has calculated, each over a 30 second interval.
